name: Pather Panchali
bio: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

name: Nayakan
bio: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.

name: Pariyerum Perumal
bio: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

name: Anbe Sivam
bio: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

name: Golmaal
bio: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his orthodox boss gets suspicious.

name: Apur Sansar
bio: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer.

name: C/o Kancharapalem
bio: Four unconventional love stories set in the town and including the people of Kancherapalem.

name: Kireedam
bio: The life of a young man turns upside down when he intervenes in a dispute in order to rescue his father (a cop) from a ruthless local outlaw.

name: Manichitrathazhu
bio: When a forbidden room in an old bungalow is unbolted, the spirit of a vengeful dancer is unleashed.

name: Natsamrat
bio: After he retires, an aging theatre actor and his wife begin to feel unwanted by their children.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

name: Black Friday
bio: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

name: Thevar Magan
bio: The urbane son of a village chieftain struggles between his personal aspirations and those of his family.

name: Drishyam 2
bio: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

name: Kumbalangi Nights
bio: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

name: Visaaranai
bio: Four labourers are tortured by the police to confess to a theft they have not committed.

name: 3 Idiots
bio: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Taare Zameen Par
bio: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: Jersey
bio: A failed cricketer decides to revive his cricketing career in his late 30's despite everyone being skeptical of his ability to do so.

name: Ratsasan
bio: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

name: Soorarai Pottru
bio: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

name: Thalapathi
bio: An orphan named Surya raised in a slum befriends a good crime boss named Devaraj and works for him. Their existence is threatened when a new honest district collector arrives.

name: Dangal
bio: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

name: Asuran
bio: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

name: Kaithi
bio: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

name: Devasuram
bio: Neelakanthan squanders away the inheritance left by his father. However, his life turns upside down when his mother reveals a terrible secret on her deathbed that changes the course of his life.

name: Aparajito
bio: Following his father's death, a boy leaves home to study in Calcutta, while his mother must face a life alone.

name: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
bio: Two friends, attempting to start-up their own photo studio, come across shady dealings, corruption and murder, and must fight to bring the guilty to light.

name: Peranbu
bio: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

name: Vada Chennai
bio: A young carrom player in north Chennai becomes a reluctant participant in a war between two warring gangsters.

name: Pyaasa
bio: A talented but indigent poet Vijay struggles for love and recognition in this selfish world.

name: Guide
bio: When mistaken to be a sage by some villagers, an ex-tour guide reflects on his past and lost love to search for spiritual wisdom to guide the villagers.

name: Thani Oruvan
bio: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.

name: Kannathil Muthamittal
bio: A little girl is told by her parents that she is adopted. Determined to find her real mother, she begs to be taken to Sri Lanka, where her mother works with a militant group of activists.

name: Chupke Chupke
bio: A newly wedded husband plays a practical joke on his wife's family with full support from his wife and friends.

name: Spadikam
bio: A small-town criminal constantly clashes with his strict school headmaster father at the expense of their family lives.

name: Iruvar
bio: A struggling actor and a writer-politician become friends as young men and rise to great heights in cinema and politics respectively. But when both become contenders for the top political post in the state, a rift develops between them.

name: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
bio: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is an authentic humorous investigative thriller revolving around the adventures of a detective based out of Nellore.

name: Super Deluxe
bio: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

name: Drishyam
bio: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

name: Vikram Vedha
bio: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

name: Aruvi
bio: A gentle girl born and brought up amidst the ever growing eco-social-consumeristic environment finds it difficult to fit in the society. She decides to take it hard on the people. What she does is the rest of the story.

name: Tumbbad
bio: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

name: Mahanati
bio: Biography of Savitri, an actress from South India movie industry, who ruled the industry for two decades during 50s and 60s.

name: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
bio: A Delhi based retired middle class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.

name: Pudhu Pettai
bio: After running away from his home Kumar falls in with a gang and slowly rises through the ranks of the Criminal Underworld.

name: Anand
bio: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

name: Premam
bio: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

name: Anniyan
bio: Ramanujam, who suffers from multiple personality disorder, works as a lawyer by day and a vigilante at night. He uses tips from the 'Garuda Purana' as his tools to expose various antisocial elements.

name: Kaakkaa Muttai
bio: Two slum kids yearn to taste a pizza after being enticed by the pizza shop that has opened near their locality. What happens when they mange to find the money to buy one?

name: Mudhalvan
bio: A man accepts a challenge to act as the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu for one day only, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

name: Andhadhun
bio: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

name: Bangalore Days
bio: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

name: Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru
bio: A police officer retires after an accident during a case investigation. Years later, he is forced to relive the past as he narrates the story to his friend's son.

name: Papanasam
bio: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Satya
bio: An innocent man is embroiled in underworld after being falsely charged and sets out to punish the perpetrators who subjected his life to misery.

name: Soodhu Kavvum
bio: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.

name: Shahid
bio: The account of Human Rights lawyer Shahid Azmi, an ordinary citizen with an extraordinary commitment to justice.

name: Jigarthanda
bio: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster because he wants to make a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, things hit the fan.

name: Pithamagan
bio: Chittan, a social outcast, has grown up in a cemetery. A drug dealer finds him a job in a cannabis farm. In prison, he meets a conman, Shakti. This friendship transforms him from his stony existence.

name: Gangs of Wasseypur
bio: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: Paan Singh Tomar
bio: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

name: Sairat
bio: In interior Maharashtra, a fisherman's son and a local politician's daughter fall in love against the restrictions of caste hierarchy.

name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
bio: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

name: Talvar
bio: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

name: Hera Pheri
bio: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

name: Swades: We, the People
bio: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

name: Sholay
bio: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

name: Black
bio: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

name: Ustad Hotel
bio: Faisi wants to go to UK to become a professional chef but circumstances force him to assist his grandfather in a small restaurant in Kozhikode city, changing his outlook on life forever.

name: Chak De! India
bio: Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

name: Nil Battey Sannata
bio: A story about a single women (a Mom) and dreams on her Daughter.

name: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
bio: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

name: Drishyam
bio: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Mughal-E-Azam
bio: A 16th century prince falls in love with a court dancer and battles with his emperor father.

name: Maheshinte Prathikaaram
bio: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
bio: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

name: Charulata
bio: The lonely wife of a newspaper editor falls in love with her visiting cousin-in-law, who shares her love for literature.

name: Article 15
bio: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

name: Udaan
bio: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

name: Theeran adhigaaram ondru
bio: Theeran, a police officer, is entrusted with the task to solve the mystery behind a series of murders. The only clue left behind is that all the murders are committed in the same pattern.

name: A Wednesday
bio: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

name: Queen
bio: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

name: Masaan
bio: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

name: Sarfarosh
bio: After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists, a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.

name: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
bio: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

name: Alai Payuthey
bio: After a difficult romance in a class-divided society, the love birds find out marriage is not what they thought it would be.

name: Dil Chahta Hai
bio: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

name: Roja
bio: A woman from a village in Tamil Nadu marries a sophisticated city dweller and moves with him to Kashmir, where all is rosy - until he gets kidnapped by militants.

name: Baasha
bio: An auto driver, Manikam, desperately tries to hide his dark underworld side to keep his promise to his father.

name: OMG: Oh My God!
bio: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

name: Rang De Basanti
bio: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

name: Chhichhore
bio: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

name: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
bio: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

name: Kahaani
bio: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

name: Andaz Apna Apna
bio: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

name: Virumandi
bio: A temperamental farmer gets embroiled in a bloody clan feud in a southern Tamil Nadu village.

name: Uri: The Surgical Strike
bio: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

name: PK
bio: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

name: Lucia
bio: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

name: Iqbal
bio: Iqbal, the deaf and mute son of a farmer, has a passion for the game of cricket and seeks the tutelage of a washed-up, alcoholic ex-player.

name: Bommarillu
bio: A young man realizes that he has to push back against his domineering father if he wants to find true happiness and love.

name: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
bio: The story of a young revolutionary who raised an armed resistance against the British rule in India.

name: Barfi!
bio: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

name: Pink
bio: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

name: Maqbool
bio: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.

name: Bombay
bio: A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.

name: Section 375
bio: A celebrated Bollywood director Rohan Khurana stands accused by a female member of his crew, Anjali Dangle of having raped her at his residence.

name: Omkara
bio: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.

name: Indian
bio: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

name: Lage Raho Munna Bhai
bio: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

name: Thadam
bio: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among cops when they discover the suspect has a lookalike.

name: The Great Indian Kitchen
bio: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

name: Pelli Choopulu
bio: A wannabe businesswoman and a happy-go-lucky guy meet each other during an arranged marriage blind date but eventually team up to start a food truck on their own.

name: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
bio: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

name: Deewaar
bio: Vijay struggles as a dockworker and eventually becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while his younger brother Ravi is an educated, upright policeman. This divide causes problems in their relationship.

name: Pranchiyettan and the Saint
bio: Pranchiyettan is a successful businessman who often has talks with an imaginary St. Francis of Assisi. The story deals with how he goes about changing his embarrassing image to making a name for himself using wealth and contacts.

name: Padosan
bio: A simple man from a village falls in love with his new neighbor. He enlists the help of his musical-theater friends to woo the lovely girl-next-door away from her music teacher.

name: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom
bio: A young man forgets a few years of his life, even as he is about to get married.

name: Gulaal
bio: A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.

name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
bio: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

name: Haider
bio: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

name: Athadu
bio: A gunman for hire is framed for murder, and assumes a dead man's identity while hiding from the police.

name: Rangasthalam
bio: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

name: Take Off
bio: In 2014, a group of Malayali nurses was captured when terrorists took over the city of Tikrit in Iraq. This movie recounts the ordeal suffered by the nurses following their capture.

name: Thondimuthalum Dhriksakshiyum
bio: Prasad and Sreeja enter wedlock and move to a new place to continue the rest of their lives. Unfortunate events begin to take place after Prasad, a small-time thief, robs Sreeja's gold chain during a bus journey.

name: Ugly
bio: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

name: Padayappa
bio: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.

name: Mother India
bio: In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, always sticks to her own moral code.

name: Special Chabbis
bio: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

name: K.G.F: Chapter 1
bio: In the 1970s, a fierce rebel rises against brutal oppression and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

name: Aadukalam
bio: In a village in South India, rearing roosters, maintaining them and using them for fights are a way of life and a matter of honor and lifeline to many people.

name: Gully Boy
bio: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

name: Vaaranam Aayiram
bio: A father and son help each other through growing up, romance, tragedy, and adventure.

name: Ship of Theseus
bio: The film explores questions of identity, justice, beauty, meaning and death through an experimental photographer, an ailing monk and a young stockbroker.

name: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
bio: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, unraveling how they and their lives are intertwined with it.

name: Badhaai ho
bio: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

name: Dev.D
bio: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
bio: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

name: Vedam
bio: A terrorist threat puts five people in jeopardy.

name: Jalsaghar
bio: Depicts the end days of a decadent zamindar (landlord) in Bengal, and his efforts to uphold his family prestige even when faced with economic adversity.

name: Vaastav: The Reality
bio: Consequences force an innocent man to get involved in crime after making an error.

name: Karnan
bio: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

name: Ankhon Dekhi
bio: After a distressing incident, a Delhi man vows to believe only what he can see, but his new ideals soon take his life in extreme directions.

name: Company
bio: A small-time gangster named Chandu teams up with Malik, a low-level enforcer for a criminal syndicate. Together they eliminate all their enemies, becoming the most feared gangsters in Mumbai.

name: Mukkabaaz
bio: A boxer struggles to make his mark in the boxing world.

name: Deiva Thirumagal
bio: A man with disabilities fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his opponent lawyer the value of love and family.

name: Arjun Reddy
bio: Arjun Reddy, a short tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

name: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
bio: Using only a hammer and a chisel, a man spends twenty-two years carving a road through a treacherous mountain.

name: Pizza
bio: A pizza delivery boy lands in a mysterious circumstance and it works a dramatic change in his life.

name: My Name Is Khan
bio: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

name: Dil Bechara
bio: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

name: Memories
bio: Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.

name: Charlie
bio: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
bio: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.

name: Jab We Met
bio: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

name: Mumbai Police
bio: ACP Antony is the only one who knows the truth behind ACP Aaryan's murder. Antony meets with an accident, losing his memory and is unable to reveal the killer. He is forced to investigate the murder again hoping that he remembers something.

name: Angamaly Diaries
bio: Vincent Pepe who wanted to be a powerful leader of a righteous gang that ruled the city, like his seniors. And then there's the rival clan with the malicious gangsters of Angamaly a locale on which the film is based.

name: Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa
bio: An aspiring filmmaker goes through the ups and downs of romance when he falls for a Christian woman who says she only wants to be friends.

name: Unnaipol Oruvan
bio: A retiring police officer remembers a thrilling case of his life which is not recorded in any case files.

name: Border
bio: In 1971, along the border region of Longewala, a small battalion of Indian soldiers goes up against a large Pakistani strike force.

name: Super 30
bio: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

name: Kaakha..Kaakha: The Police
bio: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

name: Padman
bio: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.

name: Lakshya
bio: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

name: Dor
bio: Two woman --different backgrounds, miles apart, and strangers to each other-- are linked by tragedy. Their new-found friendship is tested as one holds the fate of the other's husband in her hands.

name: Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
bio: A Police Officer investigates a series of brutal rapes and murders, with the culprits seeming to cover more than one country.

name: Bãhubali: The Beginning
bio: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

name: Hey Ram
bio: Saketh Ram's wife is raped and killed during direct action day riots in Calcutta. He is convinced that Mahatma Gandhi is responsible for all the problems happening in the country and sets out to kill him.

name: Baby
bio: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

name: Ayyappanum Koshiyum
bio: The story revolves around the clash between Ayyappan, a senior police officer who serves at the Attappadi Police Station and Havildar Koshi, who comes to the village with a motive.

name: Airlift
bio: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

name: Sonchiriya
bio: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

name: Poove Unakkaga
bio: When a man realizes that the Hindu woman he loves is in love with a Christian man, he decides to sacrifice his love and unite their families so as to make the love story a success.

name: Anjaam Pathiraa
bio: The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?

name: Hindi Medium
bio: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

name: Okkadu
bio: A Kabbadi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.

name: English Vinglish
bio: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

name: Gangaajal
bio: An IPS officer motivates and leads a dysfunctional, corrupt police force of Tezpur to fight against the corrupt politician.

name: Manam
bio: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.

name: The Lunchbox
bio: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

name: Johnny Gaddaar
bio: Police officers recount a tale of missing money which results in lies, deceit, betrayal and death.

name: Ab Tak Chhappan
bio: An honest encounter specialist's life begins to change with the arrival of a new police commissioner who has ties with a local don.

name: Joji
bio: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

name: Badla
bio: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

name: Secret Superstar
bio: A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

name: Pokiri
bio: A local goon's killer instincts earn him his girlfriend's disapproval, a corrupt cop's enmity and a wanted don's attention.

name: Nayak: The Real Hero
bio: A man accepts a challenge by the chief minister of Maharashtra to run the state for one day, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

name: Vicky Donor
bio: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

name: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
bio: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

name: Mr. India
bio: A poor but big-hearted man takes orphans into his home. After discovering his scientist father's invisibility device, he rises to the occasion and fights to save his children and all of India from the clutches of a megalomaniac.

name: Raazi
bio: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

name: Udta Punjab
bio: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

name: Stanley Ka Dabba
bio: A school-teacher, who forces children to share their food with him, forbids one from entering the school until he brings his own Tiffin/Lunch-box.

name: RangiTaranga
bio: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.

name: Don
bio: Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains Don-lookalike Vijay. But Vijay faces danger from the police and from within the gang.

name: Goodachari
bio: A young NSA agent is framed for the murder of his bosses making him realize that now his mission is darker than expected and has some personal scores to settle regarding his father's death, a former NSA agent.

name: Rock On!!
bio: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

name: Veer-Zaara
bio: Veer-Zaara is a saga of love, separation, courage and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

name: Ko
bio: Ashwin, a famous photographer, works with Renuka, an investigative journalist. When one of their colleagues, Saro, gets killed during a political meet, Ashwin and Renuka decide to investigate.

name: Aligarh
bio: A gay, linguistic professor living in a small orthodox city must deal with the aftermath of a sting operation that puts his sexual orientation in front of the entire nation.

name: Velaiilla Pattadhari
bio: A jobless young man gets to redeem himself.

name: Dasvidaniya
bio: A man who loves to make "to-do lists" makes one last bucket list when he realizes he is about to die.

name: Guru
bio: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.

name: Arya
bio: Geethanjali, who is already the girlfriend of the college rowdy Ajay, is pursued by the free spirited and Arya. Arya relentlessly tries to woo Geethanjali causing problems between him and Ajay.

name: Samsara
bio: A spiritual love-story set in the majestic landscape of Ladakh, Himalayas. Samsara is a quest; one man's struggle to find spiritual Enlightenment by renouncing the world. And one woman's struggle to keep her enlightened love and life in the world. But their destiny turns, twists ... Read all

name: Thuppakki
bio: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

name: Kai po che!
bio: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

name: Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye!
bio: Lovinder Singh, a thief now in custody and facing trial, reflects on his life of crime while the press reflect on how he managed to get away with so much before being arrested.

name: Kaththi
bio: Jeevanandham is a social activist who fights against a monstrous MNC company to restore farming. Because of destiny, Kathiresan impersonates Jeevanandham and leads the war.

name: Mumbai Meri Jaan
bio: A moving portrayal of the 2006 train bombings in Mumbai, this Indian drama follows the interconnected stories of several strangers.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

name: Rockstar
bio: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

name: Avane Srimannarayana
bio: In the pursuit of solving an ancient mystery of Amaravati, Narayana, a corrupt cop must battle the dangerous clan of dacoits and it's fierce leader.

name: Eega
bio: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.

name: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
bio: A dreamer falls for a girl who is in love with someone else and tries to create a rift between her and the man she loves.

name: Darr
bio: A woman plans to marry a navy officer but she is also the object of another man's obsession.

name: Kapoor & Sons
bio: A story revolving around a dysfunctional family of 2 brothers who visit their family and discover that their parents marriage is on the verge of collapse,the family is undergoing a financial crunch and much more as the drama unfolds.

name: Ugramm
bio: A man with a dangerous past must protect a girl from those who are hell bent on killing her.

name: Newton
bio: A government clerk on election duty in the conflict ridden jungle of Central India tries his best to conduct free and fair voting despite the apathy of security forces and the looming fear of guerrilla attacks by communist rebels.

name: Ghilli
bio: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

name: Aamir
bio: A doctor of Indian origin returning to Mumbai from London is forced to participate in a terrorist plot.

name: Sir
bio: A prosperous young Indian man falls in love with his servant, a widow with the dream of becoming a fashion designer.

name: The Tashkent Files
bio: Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

name: Earth
bio: It's 1947 and the borderlines between India and Pakistan are being drawn. A young girl witnesses tragedy as her ayah (nanny) is caught between the love of two men and the rising tide of political and religious violence.

name: Madras Cafe
bio: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

name: Agneepath
bio: A young boy's quest for revenge leads him to become a gangster as an adult, and with each day he becomes more and more like his enemies. Can he find vengeance and redemption?

name: Sarkar
bio: Subhash Nagre runs a parallel government in the city where he has a cult following. When his enemies plot to murder him, his son takes charge and stands up against them.

name: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
bio: Nishant starts dating Charu while his roommates Rajat and Vikrant already have girlfriends in Neha and Rhea respectively. Trouble starts when the guys feel that their girlfriends are dominating them.

name: Neerja
bio: Neerja is the story of the courageous Neerja Bhanot, who sacrificed her life while protecting the lives of 359 passengers on the Pan Am flight 73 in 1986. The flight was hijacked by a terrorist organization.

name: Bheja Fry
bio: Ranjit, who makes fun of idiots, gets completely annoyed when he invites a tax inspector and a singer to his house.

name: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
bio: While investigating the disappearance of a chemist, a detective uncovers a larger conspiracy to unsettle Calcutta.

name: Highway
bio: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

name: Kannum Kannum Kollaiyadithaal
bio: Two wily online scammers mend their fraudulent ways after meeting the girls of their dreams - until a deceitful discovery throws their world for a loop.

name: Magadheera
bio: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

name: Baazigar
bio: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces his younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.

name: Manorama: Six Feet Under
bio: Satyaveer accepts money from Manorama, wife of an irrigation minister, to collect evidence against her husband for having an extra-marital affair. He accepts, unaware that he too is being deceived.

name: Tanu Weds Manu Returns
bio: Tanu and Manu's marriage collapses. What happens when Manu meets Tanu's lookalike Kusum - and when Tanu returns?

name: Saala Khadoos
bio: The story of a former boxer who quits boxing following a fallout with the authorities over the underlying politics but goes on to coach a fisherwoman to fulfill his dream through her.

name: Ludo
bio: From a resurfaced sex tape to a rogue suitcase of money, four wildly different stories overlap at the whims of fate, chance and one eccentric criminal.

name: Wake Up Sid
bio: The story of a lazy Mumbai college student who does absolutely nothing, with a turn of events will Sid realize his potential in this world and become a success in the fast-paced life of Mumbai.

name: Piku
bio: A quirky comedy about the relationship between a daughter and her aging father, whose eccentricities drive everyone crazy.

name: 1 - Nenokkadine
bio: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.

name: Dhruva
bio: A committed police officer is on a very dangerous mission to destroy the most corrupt person in the country, Siddharth Abhimanyu.

name: Geetha Govindam
bio: An innocent young lecturer is misunderstood as a pervert and despised by a woman who co-incidentally turns out to be the younger sister of his brother-in-law. Eventually differences subside and love blooms between them.

name: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
bio: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

name: Jodhaa Akbar
bio: A sixteenth century love story about a marriage of alliance that gave birth to true love between a great Mughal emperor, Akbar, and a Rajput princess, Jodha.

name: Trapped
bio: A man struggles to survive after he unintentionally locks himself up in a high rise devoid of food, water and electricity.

name: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
bio: Ashwat Raina and his teammates arrive in Pokhran to re-conduct a confidential nuclear test, where they face challenges from the American Lacrosse satellite and local spies.

name: Sanju
bio: Sanju is a biopic of the controversial life of actor Sanjay Dutt: his film career, jail sentence and personal life.
